alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell; Edgefield; McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:43PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Columbia, central Richmond, southwestern Edgefield, west central Barnwell, southwestern Aiken and southeastern McCormick Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 843 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glendale, or near Augusta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Grovetown, Evans, Savannah River Site, Martinez, Aiken Mall, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, New Ellenton, Jackson, Glendale, South Augusta, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field and Citizens Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 190 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 9. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
